name: WM Party House
description:
WM Party House

My initial idea for this game was to make a multiplayer game where people could create their own rooms or join someone else’s room to hang out, dance, and have fun!

Players were supposed to be able to add any kind of video or audio stream to the room (YouTube video, playlist, livestreams, Twitch, etc.) and furnish it with all kinds of fun stuff (check out Green room for an example ⚽😉). They could also restrict access to their room by making it VIP 👑 or private 🔒.

Unfortunately, there are only so many hours in a month, so I decided to make it a single-player puzzle-adventure game with predefined number of rooms and NPCs, instead of other real players, hanging around, dancing, and having fun! (yes, robots can have fun too! 🦿 🦿 🤖)

Players can also customize their avatar skin and dance moves! 💃🕺

Web Monetization

There are two ways Web Monetization is utilized within WM Party House:

  • If players like the vibe of the room, the company, music, its interactive content, or simply are having a lot of fun, they can decide to enable Web Monetization and support room’s creator.
  • For VIP rooms, it is mandatory to enable Web Monetization to be able to join.
Theme

There is more than one mechanic in the game which corresponds to the theme. In the spirit of the theme itself, I will not reveal what they are, but rather let you discover yourself. 🙊

I would love to hear your feedback in the comments, related to the overall game, as well related to the secret mechanics and solutions to the puzzles, but please be considerate and don’t spoil the secrets to the others.

This was fun, good luck everyone!


Credits: Inspired by DJ3D; Assets: Kenney Characters, Mixamo Animations, Cube Room, WSG12-1, Fire Tunnel, dj area, RTJ4 Hands
